name: admiration
description: A feeling of deep respect or admiration for someone or something.
description-ko: 누구나 또는 무언가에 대한 깊은 존경이나 감탄의 감정

name: amusement
description: A feeling of light-hearted pleasure or enjoyment.

name: anger
description: A strong feeling of annoyance, displeasure, or hostility.
description-ko: 강한 짜증, 불쾌감, 또는 적대감의 감정

name: annoyance
description: A mild feeling of irritation or frustration.

name: approval
description: A positive feeling of agreement or acceptance.

name: caring
description: A warm feeling of concern or affection for someone.
description-ko: 누구에 대한 따뜻한 관심이나 애정의 감정

name: confusion
description: A state of being bewildered or unclear in thought.

name: curiosity
description: A desire to know or learn something new.
description-ko: 새로운 것을 알고 싶거나 배우고자 하는 욕망

name: desire
description: A strong feeling of wanting to have or do something.

name: disappointment
description: A feeling of sadness or displeasure due to unfulfilled expectations.
description-ko: 기대가 충족되지 않아 생기는 슬픔이나 불쾌감

name: disapproval
description: A feeling of disapproval or rejection of something.
description-ko: 어떤 것에 대한 반대나 거부의 감정

name: disgust
description: A strong feeling of revulsion or aversion.

name: embarrassment
description: A feeling of self-consciousness or awkwardness.

name: excitement
description: A feeling of enthusiasm or eager anticipation.

name: fear
description: An unpleasant emotion caused by the threat of danger or harm.

name: gratitude
description: A feeling of thankfulness or appreciation.

name: grief
description: A deep sorrow, especially caused by someone's death.
description-ko: 특히 누군가의 죽음으로 인한 깊은 슬픔

name: joy
description: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness.

name: love
description: A deep feeling of affection or attachment.

name: nervousness
description: A feeling of anxiety or unease.

name: optimism
description: A feeling of hopefulness and confidence about the future.

name: pride
description: A feeling of satisfaction from one's own achievements.

name: realization
description: A sudden understanding or awareness of something.
description-ko: 무엇인가에 대한 갑작스러운 이해 또는 인식

name: relief
description: A feeling of reassurance or relaxation after anxiety.

name: remorse
description: A deep regret or guilt for a wrong committed.
description-ko: 저지른 잘못에 대한 깊은 후회나 죄책감

name: sadness
description: A feeling of sorrow or unhappiness.

name: surprise
description: A feeling of astonishment or shock.

name: neutral
description: A state of having no strong positive or negative emotion.
description-ko: 강한 긍정적이거나 부정적인 감정이 없는 상태
